name: BirdHunt VR (Oculus Quest 2)
description:
Short mini game for Oculus Quest 2.

Shot as many bird targets as possible and try to get a new highscore. 

This game was developed with the Oculus Quest 2, it might also run on the Quest 1, but Im not able to test it, because I don't have a Quest 1.

The game apk can be installed with ADB or tools like SideQuest.
